_source.short_desc: Make smarter business decisions through complete operational visibility with the all-in-one, easy-to-use power of Service Fusion.
_source.long_desc:
Trusted by more than 6,000 service contractors, Service Fusion is an all-in-one field service management software built to improve your business operations and help you make smarter, more informed decisions. 

With one centralized system for customer management, dispatching, scheduling, invoicing, reporting, and payments, you gain full visibility across business operations to better serve your customers. Technicians can even utilize our mobile application to receive and manage jobs in the field.
_source.pricing_details:
Starter edition - $149/month
Plus edition - $219/month
Pro edition - $399/month
_source.target_audience: We serve over 6,000 small and mid-sized field service contractors in the HVAC, plumbing, electrical, appliance repair, home automation, A/V, locksmith, IT, and many other service industries.

infographics.infographic_title: The Top 20 Most User Friendly Field Service Management Software

related_products.short_desc: Housecall Pro is a top-rated business solution for home service professionals to streamline scheduling, dispatching, payments, & more.
related_products.features:
Call now to get up to 80% off your first month: 855-921-4757.

Housecall Pro is a top-rated, all-in-one business solution that helps home service professionals work simpler and grow smarter. With easy-to-use digital tools for scheduling and dispatching jobs, managing payments, automating marketing efforts, and more, Housecall Pro helps Pros efficiently manage every aspect of their business all in one place.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile-first, powerfully simple design to improve collaboration on the construction site and beyond.
related_products.features: Access all essential project information when you're out in the field and ensure that you are working with the most up-to-date version of drawings. Easily create and track issues, RFIs, checklists, submittals, assets - even if you can't connect to the internet.

related_products.short_desc: Buildertrend is the No. 1 construction project management software, trusted by homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors.
related_products.features: Buildertrend is the No. 1, cloud-based construction project management software for homebuilders, remodelers and specialty contractors. Since 2006, we have empowered the construction industry with a better way to build. More than 1 million users across the globe have chosen Buildertrend as their platform for real-time collaboration. Our software helps construction professionals complete projects while reducing delays, eliminating communication errors and increasing customer satisfaction.

related_products.short_desc: Motive, formerly KeepTruckin, builds technology to improve the safety, productivity, and profitability of businesses.
related_products.features: Motive, formerly KeepTruckin, builds technology to improve the safety, productivity, and profitability of businesses that power the physical economy. The Motive Automated Operations Platform combines IoT hardware with AI-powered applications to automate vehicle and equipment tracking, driver safety, compliance, maintenance, spend management, and more. Motive serves more than 120,000 businesses in trucking and logistics, construction, oil and gas, food and beverage, field service & agriculture.

related_products.short_desc: UpKeep is rated the #1 mobile-first Field Service Management Software to streamline work orders, facility, and asset management.
related_products.features: UpKeep's field service management software is a modern maintenance and asset management solution for your team. From your desktop to your phone and even your tablet, UpKeep is easily accessible from anywhere at any time. Create work orders on-the-go, get notifications when tasks are updated, and receive alerts straight from your app when assets go down making your business run more efficiently than ever before. 100% Free Download and Signup.

related_products.short_desc: The fastest, easiest, and highest value service management software to automate everything from first customer contact to getting paid.
related_products.features: mHelpDesk is the #1 easiest and most powerful software solution for your field service business, automating everything from first customer contact all the way to getting paid. We provide our customers with mobile and online tools that are unmatched in performance, reliability, and functionality. We've packed the best tools into one extremely easy-to-use and affordable package that requires no big upfront investment. And we have in-house product experts to get you up and running immediately.

related_products.short_desc: Reveal Field is a field service management solution to help simplify job management, scheduling and dispatching.
related_products.features: Reveal Field is a user-friendly field service management solution to help simplify job management, scheduling and dispatching. It can increase productivity by removing the need to call technicians for job update and streamlines your field service management tools, CRM functions and business processes into one solution. Our system also allows you to better estimate ETAs, so you can offer more exact time windows complete with text and email reminders and confirmations.

related_products.short_desc: Reveal Field is a field service management solution to help simplify job management, scheduling and dispatching.
related_products.features: Reveal Field is a user-friendly field service management solution to help simplify job management, scheduling and dispatching. It can increase productivity by removing the need to call technicians for job update and streamlines your field service management tools, CRM functions and business processes into one solution. Our system also allows you to better estimate ETAs, so you can offer more exact time windows complete with text and email reminders and confirmations.

related_products.short_desc: Reveal Field is a field service management solution to help simplify job management, scheduling and dispatching.
related_products.features: Reveal Field is a user-friendly field service management solution to help simplify job management, scheduling and dispatching. It can increase productivity by removing the need to call technicians for job update and streamlines your field service management tools, CRM functions and business processes into one solution. Our system also allows you to better estimate ETAs, so you can offer more exact time windows complete with text and email reminders and confirmations.

related_products.short_desc: Jobber helps field service businesses keep their jobs on track and offer a seamless customer experience. Try it now for free!
related_products.features: Manage your field service jobs and customer experiences with Jobber. Our field management software allows you to schedule jobs more efficiently, give your crew the necessary job details, and track jobs from start to finish, all in one place. You'll be able to send automatic payment reminders, take payments, and let customers book appointments through Facebook. With a mobile app, free training, and a simple setup, Jobber helps you save time while delivering 5-star service. Try it FREE!

related_products.short_desc: Streamline your service business with RazorSync's estimating, work order scheduling and invoicing app. Free, full-access trial!
related_products.features: RazorSync is a leading field service software designed to improve and streamline operations for field service businesses. With a desktop and mobile application, RazorSync provides expert features built to grow your business and reduce your workload. Our robust yet simple to use features include customer and team management, scheduling, integration with Quickbooks, merchant services and more. Try us risk-free for 14 days or schedule a free live demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Housecall Pro is a top-rated business solution for home service professionals to streamline scheduling, dispatching, payments, & more.
similar_products.features:
Call now to get up to 80% off your first month: 855-921-4757.

Housecall Pro is a top-rated, all-in-one business solution that helps home service professionals work simpler and grow smarter. With easy-to-use digital tools for scheduling and dispatching jobs, managing payments, automating marketing efforts, and more, Housecall Pro helps Pros efficiently manage every aspect of their business all in one place.

similar_products.short_desc: Salesforce helps transform the agent and customer experience in the field to drive satisfaction. Monitor performance in real time.
similar_products.features: Salesforce Field Service, built on the world's #1 CRM, empowers teams to provide a connected experience. By connecting the back office to the field, organizations can elevate employee interactions and exceed customer expectations. Meeting customers on their digital channel of choice with real-time appointment updates, mobile worker details, and virtual troubleshooting to make every moment memorable.

similar_products.short_desc: Jobber helps field service businesses keep their jobs on track and offer a seamless customer experience. Try it now for free!
similar_products.features: Manage your field service jobs and customer experiences with Jobber. Our field management software allows you to schedule jobs more efficiently, give your crew the necessary job details, and track jobs from start to finish, all in one place. You'll be able to send automatic payment reminders, take payments, and let customers book appointments through Facebook. With a mobile app, free training, and a simple setup, Jobber helps you save time while delivering 5-star service. Try it FREE!

similar_products.short_desc: BUILT & TRUSTED BY SERVICE PROS. #1 Most User-Friendly & Most Affordable Software for Local Service Companies with 1-25 employees.
similar_products.features: #1 Most user-friendly & most affordable FIELD SERVICE MANAGEMENT software for local service companies with 1-25 employees. Complete job management: scheduling, leads management, estimates, running complete jobs from the field, invoices, payments & more! Fully integrated with Quickbooks. We are also one of the most proven platforms available to simplify and manage your service business. Trusted by 1000s of service businesses for over 20 years. Plans starting as low as $39/month.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 software to run your entire business - FieldEdge helps you save time and make you more money!
similar_products.features: The field service management software to run your entire business is the one that the owner, office staff and technicians actually find helpful! Save 20+ hours/week with a seamless QuickBooks integration - no more double entry! Our mobile app gives technicians all the information they need to provide great customer service and be more efficient on-site. Less hassle and more control, FieldEdge is the ultimate field service software to connect your team in the office and field.

similar_products.short_desc: BlueFolder helps commercial service pros in the field stay on-schedule & access critical job details in a user-friendly interface.
similar_products.features:
BlueFolder helps commercial service pros in the field stay on-schedule, access critical job details & work order management features in a user-friendly interface. Access robust features: recurring jobs, secure custom user permissions, scheduling/dispatch, customer portals, & more. Streamline paperwork using integrations with QuickBooks & more.  

Keep all your field techs on track and streamline operations with powerful features, useful integrations, and a simple, user-friendly interface.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one Field Service Management Software for commercial MEP contractors. Dispatch, workflows, quoting/invoicing, reporting + more.
similar_products.features:
#1 Field Service Management Solution For Commercial Contractors With 5+ Technicians.

The cloud-based platform contains everything contractors need to streamline + optimize their entire service operation. Mobile + web-based applications streamline communication between field + office, improving workflows, sales, margins + customer experience. With mobile offline mode, techs don't miss a beat, even in areas with low to no service. Best for commercial contractors with 5+ technicians.

similar_products.short_desc: Sera's automated intelligence & simplified solutions empower field service businesses to focus on what matters - margins & memberships.
similar_products.features: Sera is software built for your field service business by someone who knows the business best - an award-winning plumbing and HVAC business owner. Sera uses automation and patent-pending artificial intelligence to streamline your business while reducing costly touchpoints. Running a field service business is hard, so put Sera to work for you and free up your key players to focus on what matters most - money, memberships, and margins.

similar_products.short_desc: ServiceBox is the custom solution without the custom price. Able to handle your entire business, let us show you how.
similar_products.features:
Field Service Company? Want to make things easy on your office staff and simple for your technicians?
Want to easily schedule work orders? Know where your field staff are? Looking for a solution that feels custom built for your company without the high costs? ServiceBox is the solution!  Our software is configurable to meet the needs of your company with many features.  
ServiceBox will take your company mobile and integrates with Quickbooks and Sage 50 (Canada).
Find out how we can help you!

similar_products.short_desc: simPRO is a cloud-based field service software platform designed for trade contractors. Bid/Schedule Jobs, Track Payments & Much More.
similar_products.features: simPRO is a powerful field service management software solution created by trade contractors, for trade contractors. If you're struggling with quoting jobs, managing multi-stage projects, managing inventory, connecting the office to the field, or any other areas of your workflow, simPRO provides a streamlined platform to address your pressing challenges all while helping you increase productivity and profits. More than 150,000 field service professionals trust simPRO for workflow management.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile friendly solution that provides robust dispatching, invoicing, customer tracking, technician tracking, billing and accounting.
similar_products.features: SkyBoss is a cloud-based, mobile software system that provides service businesses in depth real time field management, call tracking, technician tracking, paperless invoicing, payment processing, price book, and reporting on critical business metrics. SkyBoss is designed to streamline your business give you the tools needed to take your business to new levels of performance and revenue. SkyBoss also syncs with QuickBooks!

similar_products.short_desc: Give more power to your field teams. Track client and project information from any location and on any device.
similar_products.features: Quickbase is an application development platform that enables field teams to track client and project information from any location and on any device. Relying on spreadsheets and legacy systems can slow field teams down, resulting in missed deadlines, errors and waste. With the Quickbase platform, equip your teams with the tools they need to better manage their day with a tailored field services solution that matches your business.

similar_products.short_desc: All MUST HAVE features gathered in one place to run successful business in service industry.
similar_products.features:
Leading software for service industry, e.g. HVAC, Electrical, Plumbing, General Contracting, Carpet Cleaning, Gates, Fences, Windows, Hair and Beauty Salons.
All MUST HAVE features gathered in one place to run successful business.
Create and dispatch appointments.
Distribute work for your team through unique system of work planning.
Time Cards.
Protect yourself from negative reviews with a special service.
GPS tracking of employees.
Route optimization.
Very low credit card processing fees!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top HVAC software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.description: HVAC software automates service management for heating, ventilation and air conditioning contractors. These applications help manage inbound service calls, appointment scheduling, dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They also offer features like customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, and job location mapping tools, as well as integrating traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. HVAC software is related to Building Maintenance software, Equipment Maintenance software, Facility Management software and Mobile software.

Customer information, service calendars, employee scheduling and payroll, invoicing, payment processing, dispatch, estimating, and marketing tools are common in this type of software. Maintaining all this information in one place helps optimize service and customer retention. Quickly browse through hundreds of Maintenance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Maintenance Management software automates the tracking and scheduling of maintenance activities, enabling service organizations to operate proactively while reducing downtime and increasing operating efficiency. Maintenance Management applications can automate routine tasks while keeping track of scheduled maintenance service calls and converting completed work assignments directly into invoices ready to be processed. Maintenance Management software is related to Field Service Management software and Service Dispatch software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Plumbing software enhances the productivity of organizations that provide plumbing services by automating their day-to-day operations such as scheduling, dispatching, job costing and billing. These solutions enable communication between field employees and the dispatch office and enhance the customer experience by providing access to service history and the organization's knowledgebase to all field personnel. Plumbing software is related to Field Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Service Dispatch software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Service Dispatch tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Service Dispatch software assists with the scheduling and dispatching of field personnel. Service Dispatch applications enhance efficiency and productivity by allowing constant contact between dispatch office and offsite personnel. Service Dispatch solutions also provide field personnel with access to service histories, contracts, mapping services, job management and scheduling tools, expediting work orders and reducing downtime. Service Dispatch software is related to Field Service Management software and Maintenance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Work Order software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Work Order tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Work Order software often comes as a feature or an add on to more comprehensive Field Service Management, Service Dispatch, and Maintenance Management software systems. However, there are also stand along applications. Work Order software schedules, tracks, and reports on service requests, helps dispatch technicians to jobs, identifies overdue requests, and tracks completion time and quality of service. Some applications also allow invoicing for specific work orders. This type of software is used to automate work assignment for building and fleet maintenance crews, as well as various filed service businesses.

pricing_plans.name: Starter
pricing_plans.description: The Starter plan charges zero setup fees.

pricing_plans.name: Plus
pricing_plans.description: The plan charges zero setup fees and includes all features from the starter plan.

pricing_plans.name: Pro
pricing_plans.description: The Pro plan comes with all the features from Starter and Plus plans. Additionally, the plan does not charge any setup fees.

_source.short_desc: All-in-one field service management software to run your business from anywhere, with plans starting at a flat-rate of $149/mo.
_source.long_desc: All-in-one field service management software that provides enterprise-level features at a small business price. Run your business from anywhere by creating estimates & jobs, schedule & dispatch, invoice & process credit cards. Track customer equipment history, run sales revenue and commission reports. Send text message and email reminders to customers. Integrated with Quickbooks and zero per-user fees, zero setup fees. Starting at $149 per month, Request a Free Demo Today!
_source.pricing_details:
Starter edition - $149/month
Plus edition - $219/month
Pro edition - $399/month
_source.target_audience: We serve over 6,000 small and mid-sized field service contractors in the HVAC, plumbing, electrical, appliance repair, home automation, A/V, locksmith, IT, and many other service industries.

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Address Book
category_features.definition: Stored list of contacts and groups

category_features.name: Calendar Sync
category_features.definition: Synchronize with other calendars to view mutual availability and schedules

category_features.name: Calendar/Reminder System
category_features.definition: Notifications/alerts for upcoming events or tasks

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Color Codes/Icons
category_features.definition: A way to visually represent data where different categories of items are marked with different colors

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Integrate with email such as Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.

category_features.name: Event Management
category_features.definition: Schedule and manage the logistics of activities and other gatherings

category_features.name: Room Booking
category_features.definition: Reserve available meeting space to avoid conflicts and  to inform everyone involved on where their meetings will be held

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Task Management
category_features.definition: A running list of action items and their respective status

category_features.name: Website Integration
category_features.definition: Seamlessly integrates with 3rd party websites

related_products.short_desc: Simple-to-use, mobile-first maintenance software. Reduces downtime by 37%, increases productivity by 41%, and more.
related_products.features:
Limble CMMS is a simple to use, mobile-first software solution that helps you manage maintenance work, automate work scheduling, monitor work history, generate reports, and organize assets. 

Our average customer reduces downtime by 37%, increases productivity by 41%, reduces part spend by 29%, and increases asset life by 23%. 

Limble is trusted by companies around the world including McDonald's, Rite Aid, etc. Request a demo and we will show you how Limble can help solve your unique needs.

related_products.short_desc: MPulse's local or browser-based Maintenance Management software offers reliable scheduling, tracking, and reporting maintenance tools.
related_products.features: MPulse's easy-to-use Maintenance Management solutions provide reliable scheduling, tracking, and reporting tools for equipment and facilities maintenance organizations. Our mission at MPulse is to make maintenance operations more productive and more efficient, whatever their size. Our new MPulse Infinity Tier offers unlimited users, making scalability easy. Current clients range from small shops in public schools, restaurants, and retail outlets to global maintenance departments in enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: Manage your inventory, track PMs and compliance records, and create up-to-date fleet aircraft reports with the click of a button.
related_products.features: This cloud-based app is loaded with features that will let your fleet aircraft soar even higher. Manage all craft maintenance, keep meticulous records of PM work and repairs, and create work orders with the click of a button. The app tracks what?s in your inventory and lets you set minimum and maximum stock so you know when you need to reorder parts. Fullbay cuts out a lot of the paperwork and back-and-forth, allowing your AMTs to be more efficient and focus on their real work!

related_products.short_desc: Flightdocs provides web and app based aircraft maintenance, inventory tracking and flight scheduling backed by 24/7/365 Analyst Support
related_products.features: ATP Flightdocs is the premier application for complete flight department management. Since 2003 Flightdocs has been empowering aircraft operators by leveraging advanced technology and customer service to ensure their maintenance and inventory tracking meets the highest levels of safety, quality, and efficiency.

related_products.short_desc: Fluix is the fastest way to convert paper tech logs into digital format and streamline MRO to keep the fleet on the ground less.
related_products.features:
Fluix is a no-code, simple-to-use software solution that helps flight operators to digitize documents and automate routine tasks.
We solve the pain points of office and pilot teams who want to fill out voyage reports and tech logs while in-flight and have the data at hand automatically grouped at the moment they land.

Fluix can be accessed via iOS and Android apps or web browsers.

Help your team become more productive and make your business more efficient. 

FOR TEAMS OF 10+ USERS.

related_products.short_desc: A composable enterprise application delivering ERP, FSM and EAM capabilities on a single platform.
related_products.features: IFS Cloud is a composable enterprise software application that orchestrates customers, people, and assets to reduce complexity, cost and risk as you plan, manage and optimize critical asset availability, strive for operational excellence and workforce productivity. IFS Cloud delivers a broad set of ERP, Service Management and Enterprise Asset Management capabilities. Organizations choose the capabilities they need from across the solution areas.

related_products.short_desc: Aircraft maintenance, work order, inventory, timesheet tracking and document generation system perfect for GA A&P and pt145 US & Canada
related_products.features: For A&P shops and Part 145 repair stations of fixed wing, rotorcraft, turbine aircraft:  maintenance reminders, work orders, parts tracking, inventory, timesheets, purchase orders, PDF Invoices, Quotes and custom form-fill document generation.  Powerful efficiency tools, reports and online Customer Portal.  Document discrepancies, corrective actions, and print PDF Logbook Entries and Weight and Balance forms.  Works beautifully from any computer, tablet or smartphone.

related_products.short_desc: MicroMain CMMS/EAM software is the most powerful, flexible, & easy-to-use maintenance management software.
related_products.features: MicroMain CMMS/EAM software is the most powerful, flexible, & easy-to-use maintenance management software. The software gives you the tools to streamline maintenance operations, maximize productivity, and reduce costs. The platform is easy-to-use with robust features and an intuitive interface that makes it easy to set-up, track, and report on Work Orders, Preventive Maintenance Scheduling, Assets, Labor, Inspections, Parts Inventory, and much more. Cloud-based with available on-premise option.

related_products.short_desc: Asset infinity's maintenance management software for aviation provides maint. on time & ensures assets longevity & boost asset Prfm.
related_products.features:
Asset Infinity's maintenance management software for aviation industry provides a robust routine of proactive & schedule maintenance, reviewing testing, fixing, and updating so that equipment performance can be optimized.

Our software ensures that aviation equipment gets maintenance, Repair, and Overhaul (MRO) on time. We empower you to reduce downtime and minimize sudden equipment failure chances. You can schedule maintenance and receive alerts & notifications about the same.

related_products.short_desc: AMS' feature-rich software suite offers customer-proven maintenance and inventory management solutions to aviation clients worldwide.
related_products.features:
AMS offers a flexible modular software suite that manages aircraft maintenance and inventory operations. We serve the needs of all aircraft operators' fleet, whether fixed or rotor wings, as well as Part 145 and CAMO organisations.
Our solutions cover all the maintenance steps to achieve the quick release of an aircraft. Benefit from improved aircraft uptime; optimize operational costs with reporting; support customer service by dedicated online access, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Aircraft maintenance solution with work orders, aircraft scheduled maintenance, labor hours tracking, and QuickBooks integration.
related_products.features: AMI is a powerful and elegant set of fully integrated aviation maintenance systems to work seamlessly together, saving time and money in the process. AMI is a Complete Work Order & Inventory System explicitly designed for your Aircraft Maintenance Operation. Some key features are Labor Hours Tracking, Scheduled Maintenace,  QuickBooks Integration, & a Dynamic Customer Portal. The system will also Auto-Create Form 337s, Maintenance Records, & Weight and Balance forms.

similar_products.short_desc: Ramco offers next-gen aviation maintenance software for MROs, Defense, Heli operators, Airlines and Drones to drive efficiency.
similar_products.features: Ramco offers Aviation Maintenance software on premise & on cloud for Airlines, Heli-operators, MROs & Charters. Ramco's Next-Gen technologies include Mobility for seamless last mile connectivity through an app, aviation Chat Bots & a Hyper-Connected Ecosystem via B2B integrations with AeroXchange, Gains, Logistics providers & OEMs to bring suppliers, customers together on a unified platform. We power 4000+ aircraft & 21,000+ end-users globally. Ranked as Technology Innovation Champion by Frost.

similar_products.short_desc: Aircraft maintenance management tracking software along with a reliability tracking system.
similar_products.features:
Save $15K or more in real $ every year. Ask us how!

C.A.L.M. Systems, Inc. (Computerized Aircraft Log Manager) has been serving the Aircraft Maintenance community for over 25 years. Our modular software is used by customers worldwide to manage their fleets of 1-100 aircraft.  

To find out how a DOM can update each of his 60 aircraft daily in 3 minutes or less, and print Due Reports in a matter of seconds for each aircraft or his entire fleet, please contact us to learn more.

similar_products.features:

Web-based and device-agnostic, ENVISION has an intuitive and user-friendly interface with 10 modules and 3 apps that can be purchased individually or as part of an integrated solution.

similar_products.short_desc: Solumina MRO expedites, streamlines, and simplifies complex, often error-prone MRO processes while helping to lower maintenance costs.

Control costs by improving efficiency, reducing held inventory, providing proof of quality for inspection escalations, and directly reducing clerical requirements.

related_categories.description: Equipment Maintenance software automates the process of managing equipment history and maintenance records. These applications help manage inbound service calls, schedule appointments, and provide dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They also offer features like customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and they integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Equipment Maintenance software is related to Building Maintenance software, Facility Management software, Field Service Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.description: Fleet Maintenance software concentrates on repairs and the preventive maintenance aspect of managing business vehicles. Maintenance schedules, work orders, vehicle lifespan tracking, parts management, service records, etc. are typical functions for this type of software. Fleet Maintenance functionality would often be included as part of a more comprehensive Fleet Management package. For related solutions see also Aviation Maintenance, Equipment Maintenance, Maintenance Management, and Trucking software.
